levelName: 英文單字認讀成長級(八)

examples.english: The ancient castle stood tall on the hill for centuries.
examples.chinese: 這座古老的城堡在山上已經矗立了好幾個世紀。

examples.english: Every princess dreams of living in a beautiful castle.
examples.chinese: 每位公主都夢想著住在一座美麗的城堡裡。

examples.english: We visited a famous medieval castle during our trip to Europe.
examples.chinese: 我們在歐洲旅行時參觀了一座著名的中世紀城堡。

examples.english: The king ruled his country wisely for many years.
examples.chinese: 這位國王明智地統治他的國家許多年。

examples.english: The lion is often called the king of the jungle.
examples.chinese: 獅子常被稱為叢林之王。

examples.english: In this card game, the king card has the highest value.
examples.chinese: 在這個牌戲中，國王牌有最高的價值。

examples.english: The young queen bravely led her country during the war.
examples.chinese: 年輕的女王在戰爭期間勇敢地領導她的國家。

examples.english: The handsome prince will marry the beautiful princess, who will become queen.
examples.chinese: 這位英俊的王子將娶美麗的公主，她將成為王后。

examples.english: She is often called the 'Queen of Pop' for her amazing music.
examples.chinese: 她常因其美妙的音樂而被稱為「流行音樂天后」。

examples.english: The young prince, who lives in the castle, will rule someday.
examples.chinese: 這位住在城堡裡的年輕王子，有朝一日將會統治。

examples.english: Every girl hopes to meet her charming prince.
examples.chinese: 每個女孩都希望遇到她迷人的王子。

examples.english: He acts like a true prince, always polite and gentle.
examples.chinese: 他表現得像個真正的王子，總是彬彬有禮又溫文儒雅。

examples.english: The young princess inherited the throne after her father.
examples.chinese: 年輕的公主在她父親之後繼承了王位。

examples.english: Stop acting like a princess; do your chores now!
examples.chinese: 別再像個公主了；現在就做你的家事！

examples.english: Every father treats his little girl like a princess.
examples.chinese: 每位父親都把他的小女兒當成小公主般疼愛。

examples.english: Every soldier trains hard to protect their country.
examples.chinese: 每個士兵都努力訓練以保衛他們的國家。

examples.english: The brave soldier rescued many people during the flood.
examples.chinese: 這位勇敢的士兵在洪水期間拯救了許多人。

examples.english: Many soldiers stood guard at the palace gate.
examples.chinese: 許多士兵站在宮殿門口站崗。

examples.english: The brave knight fought a fierce dragon in the old tale.
examples.chinese: 勇敢的騎士在古老的故事中與一條兇猛的龍搏鬥。

examples.english: In Chinese culture, dragons symbolize power and good fortune.
examples.chinese: 在中華文化中，龍象徵著權力和好運。

examples.english: Ancient Chinese emperors used the dragon as their royal symbol.
examples.chinese: 古代中國皇帝以龍作為他們的皇家象徵。

examples.english: Don't forget to review for the history quiz on Friday.
examples.chinese: 別忘了複習週五的歷史小考。

examples.english: The teacher will quiz us on the new grammar rules tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 老師明天會測驗我們新的文法規則。

examples.english: Everyone was surprised when our teacher gave a sudden pop quiz.
examples.chinese: 老師突然出了一個隨堂考，大家都嚇了一跳。

examples.english: Please check your answers carefully before you hand in the test.
examples.chinese: 請你在交考卷前仔細核對答案。

examples.english: Don't forget to check if the gas is off when you leave home.
examples.chinese: 離開家前別忘了檢查瓦斯是否關閉。

examples.english: The teacher asked us to check our notebooks for any missing pages.
examples.chinese: 老師要求我們檢查筆記本是否有缺頁。

examples.english: I don't have much time to play video games today.
examples.chinese: 我今天沒有很多時間玩電動遊戲。

examples.english: This new phone is much faster than my old one.
examples.chinese: 這支新手機比我舊的那支快很多。

examples.english: Do you enjoy going to the museum very much?
examples.chinese: 你非常喜歡去博物館嗎？

examples.english: Reading books every night is a good habit to develop.
examples.chinese: 每晚讀書是個值得培養的好習慣。

examples.english: It's difficult to break a bad habit once you get used to it.
examples.chinese: 一旦你習慣了壞習慣，就很難改掉。

examples.english: You should form a habit of exercising regularly for your health.
examples.chinese: 為了健康，你應該養成規律運動的習慣。

examples.english: Can you spell every word on the blackboard correctly?
examples.chinese: 你能拼對黑板上的每一個字嗎？

examples.english: Students should try to learn ten new words every week.
examples.chinese: 學生每週應該努力學習十個新字。

examples.english: Some words in this old book are hard to read clearly.
examples.chinese: 這本舊書裡有些字很難清楚辨讀。

examples.english: Please write a simple sentence about your favorite food.
examples.chinese: 請寫一個關於你最喜歡食物的簡單句子。

examples.english: This long sentence has too many confusing words.
examples.chinese: 這個長句子有太多令人困惑的詞彙。

examples.english: Try to speak in complete sentences during your presentation.
examples.chinese: 在你的簡報中，試著說出完整的句子。

examples.english: She got good marks on her math test.
examples.chinese: 她在數學考試中得到好成績。

examples.english: Please mark your answer with an "X" on the paper.
examples.chinese: 請在紙上用「X」標示你的答案。

examples.english: His kindness left a deep mark on my heart.
examples.chinese: 他的善良在我心中留下了深刻的印記。

examples.english: Always use your dictionary to look up unfamiliar words.
examples.chinese: 遇到不熟悉的單字時，記得使用你的字典查詢。

examples.english: A dictionary provides word meanings, pronunciations, and examples.
examples.chinese: 字典提供單字的意義、發音和例句。

examples.english: Many students now use a dictionary app on their smartphones.
examples.chinese: 現在許多學生在智慧型手機上使用字典應用程式。

examples.english: The main point of the article is about protecting our planet.
examples.chinese: 這篇文章的要點是關於保護我們的地球。

examples.english: You made a good point about saving water at home.
examples.chinese: 你提出了一個關於在家裡節約用水的好意見。

examples.english: There's no point in arguing when you know you're wrong.
examples.chinese: 當你知道自己錯了，爭辯就沒有任何意義了。

examples.english: He received an excellent grade in science this semester.
examples.chinese: 他這學期科學考了很棒的成績。

examples.english: My cousin is now in the ninth grade at junior high school.
examples.chinese: 我表哥現在是國中九年級的學生。

examples.english: These eggs are top grade, so they usually cost more.
examples.chinese: 這些雞蛋是最高等級的，所以它們通常比較貴。

examples.english: It's easy to make a mistake when you hurry.
examples.chinese: 匆忙時很容易犯錯。

examples.english: Not studying for the exam was a big mistake.
examples.chinese: 沒有為考試讀書是一個大錯誤。

examples.english: Don't be afraid to make mistakes; they help you learn.
examples.chinese: 不要害怕犯錯；它們能幫助你學習。

examples.english: My little brother will start elementary school next year.
examples.chinese: 我弟弟明年會上小學。

examples.english: We learned basic math skills in elementary school.
examples.chinese: 我們在小學學到基本的數學能力。

examples.english: The elementary school near my house has a big playground.
examples.chinese: 我家附近的小學有一個大操場。

examples.english: We often sit on the park bench to relax and enjoy the view.
examples.chinese: 我們經常坐在公園的長板凳上休息，欣賞風景。

examples.english: There is a long wooden bench for students to wait outside the classroom.
examples.chinese: 教室外面有一張木製的長板凳，供學生等候。

examples.english: She found an empty bench under the tree and read her book.
examples.chinese: 她在樹下找到一張空板凳，然後讀她的書。

examples.english: Please take a seat and wait for your turn.
examples.chinese: 請就座並等候輪到你。

examples.english: Our seats for the movie are in the front row.
examples.chinese: 我們看電影的座位在前排。

examples.english: Are there any empty seats on this bus?
examples.chinese: 這輛公車上還有空位嗎？

examples.english: My mom works in a big office building downtown.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽在市中心的一棟大辦公大樓工作。

examples.english: The principal's office is on the second floor of the school.
examples.chinese: 校長辦公室在學校的二樓。

examples.english: I need to go to the post office to mail this letter.
examples.chinese: 我需要去郵局寄這封信。

examples.english: Excuse me, where is the nearest post office?
examples.chinese: 不好意思，請問最近的郵局在哪裡？

examples.english: I went to the post office to mail a package yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我昨天去郵局寄了一個包裹。

examples.english: My mom often goes to the post office to pick up letters.
examples.chinese: 我媽媽常常去郵局領信。

examples.english: Please sit on this side of the table.
examples.chinese: 請坐這桌子的這一邊。

examples.english: Look at the bright side, things will get better.
examples.chinese: 往好處想，事情會變好的。

examples.english: Which side are you on in this argument?
examples.chinese: 在這場爭論中，你支持哪一邊？

examples.english: We found a small way leading to the river.
examples.chinese: 我們找到一條通往河流的小路。

examples.english: Can you tell me the way to the nearest bus stop?
examples.chinese: 你能告訴我到最近的公車站的路怎麼走嗎？

examples.english: It was a long way home after the tiring trip.
examples.chinese: 漫長的旅程後，回家的路很遠。

examples.english: Nobody was at the park yesterday morning.
examples.chinese: 昨天早上公園無人。

examples.english: He felt like a nobody after losing the game.
examples.chinese: 比賽輸了以後，他覺得自己像個無名小卒。

examples.english: Nobody knows what the future will bring.
examples.chinese: 無人知曉未來會帶來什麼。

examples.english: Who is that tall guy standing over there?
examples.chinese: 那個站在那邊的高個子傢伙是誰？

examples.english: He's a nice guy and always helps his friends.
examples.chinese: 他是個好傢伙，而且總是幫助他的朋友。

examples.english: You guys did a really great job on the project!
examples.chinese: 你們這些傢伙在專案上做得真棒！

examples.english: I joined a new volunteer group last month.
examples.chinese: 我上個月加入了一個新的志工團體。

examples.english: A small group of students waited for the bus.
examples.chinese: 一小群學生在等公車。

examples.english: The teacher asked us to work in small groups.
examples.chinese: 老師要我們分組合作。

examples.english: We love to visit the quiet country on weekends.
examples.chinese: 我們喜歡在週末去安靜的鄉村。

examples.english: My grandparents live in a beautiful country house.
examples.chinese: 我的祖父母住在一間美麗的鄉村房屋。

examples.english: Fresh air in the country is much better than city air.
examples.chinese: 鄉村的新鮮空氣比都市的好很多。

examples.english: My favorite TV program is a funny cartoon.
examples.chinese: 我最喜歡的電視節目是卡通。

examples.english: The school held a special program for parents.
examples.chinese: 學校為家長們舉辦了一個特別節目。

examples.english: The art festival includes many wonderful programs.
examples.chinese: 這個藝術節包含許多精彩節目。

examples.english: She always uses a straw to drink her bubble tea.
examples.chinese: 她總是習慣用吸管喝珍珠奶茶。

examples.english: Remember to bring your own straw to reduce plastic waste.
examples.chinese: 記得自備吸管，以減少塑膠垃圾。

examples.english: Excuse me, could I get a paper straw instead of plastic?
examples.chinese: 不好意思，我可以改用紙吸管，不要塑膠的嗎？

examples.english: Please use this knife to slice the cake carefully.
examples.chinese: 請小心地用這把刀子切蛋糕。

examples.english: Each person needs a fork, a spoon, and a knife for dinner.
examples.chinese: 每個人晚餐需要一把叉子、一個湯匙和一把刀子。

examples.english: He used a small knife to open the package quickly.
examples.chinese: 他用一把小刀子快速打開包裹。

examples.english: Please pass me a fork to eat my pasta.
examples.chinese: 請遞給我一把叉子來吃我的義大利麵。

examples.english: We reached a fork in the road and had to choose.
examples.chinese: 我們走到一個岔路口，必須做出選擇。

examples.english: The hiking trail forks near the big waterfall.
examples.chinese: 這條健行步道在大瀑布附近分岔。

examples.english: He used a spoon to eat the soup.
examples.chinese: 他用湯匙喝湯。

examples.english: She carefully spoons the jam into a small jar.
examples.chinese: 她小心地將果醬舀進一個小罐子裡。

examples.english: Please take one spoon of cough medicine before bed.
examples.chinese: 睡前請服用一湯匙的止咳藥。

examples.english: We had a lovely time visiting the museum yesterday.
examples.chinese: 我們昨天參觀博物館度過了一段美好的時光。

examples.english: She has such a lovely voice when she sings.
examples.chinese: 她唱歌時有著如此美好的歌聲。

examples.english: It would be lovely if you could join us for dinner.
examples.chinese: 如果你能和我們一起吃晚餐，那會很美好。

examples.english: We hope the weather will be clear for our school trip.我們希望校外教學時天氣會很晴朗。
The teacher's instructions were clear, so everyone understood.老師的指示很清楚，所以大家都明白了。
Before starting, make sure your goals are clear.開始之前，請確保你的目標是明確的。
Please make sure your information is correct before submitting the form.
examples.chinese: 請確保你的資料在提交表格前是正確的。

examples.english: The teacher helped me correct the grammar mistakes in my essay.
examples.chinese: 老師幫我改正了我作文中的文法錯誤。

examples.english: Please make sure you wear the correct uniform for school.
examples.chinese: 請確保你穿著學校的正確制服。

examples.english: The library is far from our school.
examples.chinese: 圖書館離我們學校很遠。

examples.english: This movie is far more interesting than that one.
examples.chinese: 這部電影遠比那部有趣。

examples.english: We hiked far up the mountain to see the view.
examples.chinese: 我們爬到山上很遠的地方看風景。

examples.english: Always wear a helmet to keep yourself safe when riding your bike.
examples.chinese: 騎自行車時，請務必戴上頭盔以確保自身安全。

examples.english: Is it safe to walk alone here at night?
examples.chinese: 晚上獨自一人走在這裡安全嗎？

examples.english: Using a password makes your online account safe.
examples.chinese: 使用密碼能讓你的網路帳號安全。

examples.english: The chef used a very sharp knife to slice the vegetables thinly.
examples.chinese: 主廚用一把很鋒利的刀將蔬菜切得很薄。

examples.english: I felt a sharp pain in my leg after running.
examples.chinese: 跑步後，我感到腿部一陣劇烈的疼痛。

examples.english: He has a sharp mind and always understands things quickly.
examples.chinese: 他頭腦很靈敏，總是很快就能理解事情。

examples.english: Don't be lazy; you should finish your homework before playing games.
examples.chinese: 別偷懶，你應該在玩遊戲前完成作業。

examples.english: My younger brother is so lazy that he never helps with household chores.
examples.chinese: 我弟弟很懶惰，從不幫忙做家事。

examples.english: On weekends, I like to have a lazy morning reading books in bed.
examples.chinese: 週末時，我喜歡在床上悠閒地讀書度過一個懶散的早晨。

results.error: API Error: No image data in response

examples.english: I am glad to see you all here today.
examples.chinese: 我很高興今天能在這裡見到大家。

examples.english: She was glad that her team won the basketball game.
examples.chinese: 她很高興她的隊伍贏得了籃球比賽。

examples.english: We are glad about the good news from our teacher.
examples.chinese: 我們很高興聽到老師帶來的好消息。

examples.english: Her excellent drawing skills won her the art competition. (9 words)
examples.chinese: 她的優秀繪畫技巧讓她贏得了美術比賽。

examples.english: The school's new facilities offer excellent learning conditions. (9 words)
examples.chinese: 學校的新設施提供了優良的學習環境。

examples.english: Staying hydrated is an excellent habit for good health. (10 words)
examples.chinese: 保持水分充足是個維持身體健康的優秀習慣。

examples.english: The class is over, so we can go home now.
examples.chinese: 課結束了，所以我們現在可以回家了。

examples.english: He is over 180 centimeters tall, which is quite tall.
examples.chinese: 他身高超過180公分，相當高。

examples.english: Jump over the puddle to keep your shoes dry.
examples.chinese: 跳過水窪，讓你的鞋子保持乾燥。

examples.english: Time passes so quickly when you are having fun.
examples.chinese: 當你玩得開心時，時間過得真快。

examples.english: I hope I can pass my English test easily.
examples.chinese: 我希望我能輕鬆通過我的英文考試。

examples.english: Could you please pass the book to me?
examples.chinese: 你可以把那本書傳給我嗎？

examples.english: If you don't study hard, you might fail the English exam.
examples.chinese: 如果你不努力讀書，你可能會英文不及格。

examples.english: We tried our best, but we still failed to win the game.
examples.chinese: 我們盡力了，但我們還是沒能贏得比賽。

examples.english: Even if you fail, don't give up and try again.
examples.chinese: 即使你失敗了，也別放棄，再試一次。

examples.english: Our preparation for the science fair began last month.
examples.chinese: 我們為科展做的準備從上個月就開始了。

examples.english: Good preparation is key to passing difficult exams.
examples.chinese: 充分的準備是通過困難考試的關鍵。

examples.english: He felt confident because his preparation was very thorough.
examples.chinese: 他感到很有自信，因為他的準備非常充分。

examples.english: Students should never cheat on exams; it's dishonest and unfair.
examples.chinese: 學生絕不該在考試中作弊；那是不誠實且不公平的行為。

examples.english: The team was accused of cheating by using illegal equipment.
examples.chinese: 該隊被指控使用非法器材作弊。

examples.english: He tried to cheat his way through the project without doing real work.
examples.chinese: 他試圖作弊完成這個專案，而不做實質工作。

examples.english: Please copy these sentences into your grammar book.
examples.chinese: 請把這些句子抄寫到你的文法書裡。

examples.english: Could you help me copy this old photograph?
examples.chinese: 你可以幫我複製這張舊照片嗎？

examples.english: Don't copy other students' homework; do your own work.
examples.chinese: 不要抄襲其他同學的作業，做你自己的。

examples.english: The child loved to blow bubbles in the park.
examples.chinese: 那孩子喜歡在公園裡吹泡泡。

examples.english: The cold wind blew from the north all night.
examples.chinese: 冷風整夜從北方吹來。

examples.english: He learned to blow the trumpet in music class.
examples.chinese: 他在音樂課上學會吹小喇叭。

examples.english: Please knock on the door before you enter my room.
examples.chinese: 請你在進我房間之前先敲門。

examples.english: He accidentally knocked into the table and spilled his drink.
examples.chinese: 他不小心撞到桌子，把飲料打翻了。

examples.english: Knock on wood, I hope I pass the test tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 敲敲木頭，我希望我明天的考試會及格。

examples.english: The sun will rise at 6 AM tomorrow.
examples.chinese: 太陽明天早上六點升起。

examples.english: Food prices are expected to rise this month.
examples.chinese: 食物價格預計這個月會上升。

examples.english: She had to rise early to catch the bus.
examples.chinese: 她必須早起才能趕上公車。

examples.english: My sister decided to study hard for the exam.
examples.chinese: 我的姐姐決定為考試認真讀書。

examples.english: He couldn't decide whether to play basketball or soccer.
examples.chinese: 他無法決定要打籃球還是足球。

examples.english: After discussing, they decided on the blue shirt.
examples.chinese: 討論過後，他們決定選擇那件藍色襯衫。

examples.english: Did you notice the new student in our class today?
examples.chinese: 你今天有注意到我們班上的新同學嗎？

examples.english: The teacher put up a notice about the field trip.老師張貼了一則關於校外教學的通知。
You should notice the details when you write your report.
examples.chinese: 你寫報告時應該要注意細節。

examples.english: My grandma loves to collect beautiful teacups from her travels.
examples.chinese: 我奶奶喜歡從旅行中收集漂亮的茶杯。

examples.english: Our class needs to collect money for the upcoming field trip.
examples.chinese: 我們班需要為即將到來的校外教學收集錢。

examples.english: She paused for a moment to collect her thoughts before speaking.
examples.chinese: 她在說話前停頓了一下，整理思緒。

examples.english: We need to leave the house by 7 AM.
examples.chinese: 我們需要在早上七點前離開家。

examples.english: Don't leave your bag on the bus.
examples.chinese: 不要把你的包包忘在公車上。

examples.english: Please leave a message if I'm not home.
examples.chinese: 如果我不在家，請留言。

examples.english: It's important to treat everyone fairly, regardless of their background.
examples.chinese: 公平對待每個人，不論他們的背景，這很重要。

examples.english: To celebrate, Dad decided to treat us to a delicious meal.
examples.chinese: 為了慶祝，爸爸決定請我們吃一頓美味的餐點。

examples.english: A day off from school is always a special treat for students.
examples.chinese: 放學一天對學生來說總是一種特別的享受。

examples.english: We walked along the beach to watch the sunset.
examples.chinese: 我們沿著海灘散步去看夕陽。

examples.english: Can you bring your textbook along to class tomorrow?
examples.chinese: 你明天能把課本帶到班上來嗎？

examples.english: How is your English project coming along? Is it finished?
examples.chinese: 你的英文專案進展如何？完成了嗎？

examples.english: It's hard to finish homework without a computer.
examples.chinese: 沒有電腦，很難完成功課。

examples.english: Don't leave without saying goodbye to your parents.
examples.chinese: 不要沒有跟你的父母道別就離開。

examples.english: We cannot achieve success without working hard.
examples.chinese: 沒有努力，我們無法成功。

examples.english: You will find your lost keys inside the drawer.
examples.chinese: 你會在抽屜裡找到你遺失的鑰匙。

examples.english: It's too cold outside, so we should stay inside.
examples.chinese: 外面太冷了，所以我們應該待在室內。

examples.english: She felt a little nervous inside before the big test.
examples.chinese: 在大考前，她心裡有點緊張。

examples.english: Please repeat the instructions clearly so everyone understands.
examples.chinese: 請清楚地重複指示，好讓每個人都明白。

examples.english: Don't repeat the same mistake; try to learn from it.
examples.chinese: 不要重複犯相同的錯誤；試著從中學習。

examples.english: History often repeats itself, so we should learn from the past.
examples.chinese: 歷史常常重複上演，所以我們應該從過去學習。

examples.english: Perhaps it will rain tomorrow, so bring an umbrella.
examples.chinese: 明天或許會下雨，所以帶把傘吧。

examples.english: We could perhaps visit the museum this weekend.
examples.chinese: 或許我們這個週末可以去參觀博物館。

examples.english: She was quiet, perhaps because she felt shy.
examples.chinese: 她很安靜，或許是因為她覺得害羞。

examples.english: If you study hard, you will pass the exam easily.
examples.chinese: 如果你努力讀書，你會很容易通過考試的。

examples.english: She asked if I wanted to join their club.
examples.chinese: 她問我是否想加入他們的社團。

examples.english: What if we miss the last bus home tonight?
examples.chinese: 萬一我們今晚錯過最後一班回家的公車怎麼辦？

examples.english: Although it was raining, we still went to the park.
examples.chinese: 雖然下雨，我們還是去公園了。

examples.english: Although the movie was long, I really enjoyed it.
examples.chinese: 雖然電影很長，我真的很喜歡它。

examples.english: He felt tired, although he had slept for eight hours.
examples.chinese: 他覺得很累，雖然他已經睡了八個小時。

examples.english: She hopes to study abroad after high school.
examples.chinese: 她希望高中畢業後能出國讀書。

examples.english: We hope that the rain will stop soon.
examples.chinese: 我們希望雨很快就會停。

examples.english: His inspiring story gave us all new hope.
examples.chinese: 他激勵人心的故事帶給了我們所有人新的希望。

examples.english: An ancient king once ruled this vast land for many years.
examples.chinese: 一位古代國王曾統治這片廣闊的土地多年。

examples.english: The umpire's rule on the foul play was final.
examples.chinese: 裁判對犯規的裁決是最終的。

examples.english: Always follow the traffic rules to stay safe on the road.
examples.chinese: 在路上行駛時，請務必遵守交通規則以確保安全。

examples.english: I wish you good luck on your important basketball game.
examples.chinese: 我希望你在重要的籃球比賽中好運。

examples.english: I wish I had more free time for hobbies.
examples.chinese: 我希望我有更多空閒時間發展嗜好。

examples.english: If you see a shooting star, make a wish!
examples.chinese: 如果你看到流星，許個願吧！

examples.english: The little girl drew a red dot on the paper.
examples.chinese: 小女孩在紙上畫了一個紅點。

examples.english: He arrived at 7 o'clock on the dot for the meeting.
examples.chinese: 他準時在七點整抵達會議。

examples.english: The tiny island was just a dot on the map.
examples.chinese: 這個小島在地圖上只是一個小點。

examples.english: Please draw a perfect circle on the whiteboard for the math problem.
examples.chinese: 請在白板上畫一個完美的圓圈來解這道數學題。

examples.english: The plane circled above the airport for a while before landing safely.
examples.chinese: 飛機在機場上空盤旋了一會兒才安全降落。

examples.english: He enjoys spending time with his close circle of friends on weekends.
examples.chinese: 他喜歡在週末和他的親密朋友圈一起度過時光。

examples.english: The clouds in the sky changed their shape quickly.
examples.chinese: 天空中的雲朵形狀變化很快。

examples.english: You need to exercise to get back in shape before summer.
examples.chinese: 你需要在夏天前運動來恢復好體態。

examples.english: His childhood experiences helped shape his personality greatly.
examples.chinese: 他的童年經驗大大地幫助塑造了他的個性。

examples.english: You should measure the exact size of the door before buying.
examples.chinese: 你在購買前應該測量門的確切尺寸。

examples.english: Excuse me, do you have this shirt in a different size?
examples.chinese: 不好意思，這件襯衫有別的尺寸嗎？

examples.english: They did not realize the great size of the task.
examples.chinese: 他們沒有意識到這項任務的規模有多大。

results.meaning: 正方形；廣場;正方形(的)；廣場

examples.english: She learned how to draw a perfect square in math class today.
examples.chinese: 她今天在數學課上學會了如何畫一個完美的正方形。

examples.english: Many people gathered in the city square to enjoy the music festival.
examples.chinese: 許多人聚集在市中心的廣場享受音樂節。

examples.english: He bought a small square box to put his new collectible inside.
examples.chinese: 他買了一個小小的正方形盒子來裝他新的收藏品。

examples.english: My parents sometimes let me stay up late on weekends.
examples.chinese: 我的父母有時候會讓我在週末熬夜。

examples.english: Please let me know if you need any help.
examples.chinese: 如果你需要任何幫助，請讓我知道。

examples.english: Don't let your fears stop you from trying.
examples.chinese: 別讓你的恐懼阻止你嘗試。

examples.english: A football field is one hundred yards long.
examples.chinese: 足球場有一百碼長。

examples.english: The children played happily in the big yard.
examples.chinese: 孩子們在大庭院裡開心地玩耍。

examples.english: Our house has a lovely green yard with many flowers.
examples.chinese: 我們家有一個美麗的綠色庭院，種了許多花。

examples.english: The heavy rain left two inches of water in the garden.
examples.chinese: 大雨在花園裡留下了兩英吋深的水。

examples.english: The car inched forward in the heavy traffic.
examples.chinese: 在塞車中，車子緩慢地向前挪動。

examples.english: The team inched closer to winning the championship.
examples.chinese: 這支隊伍慢慢地接近贏得冠軍。
